nodes.text: Barma Battle Group was a New Republic battle group under the command of General Hera Syndulla. The battle group's flagship was the Lodestar. Hail Squadron and Meteor Squadron were part of the battle group. Sometime after the Battle of Endor, Syndulla made a deal with New Republic Intelligence Agent Caern Adan to station the newly formed Alphabet Squadron onboard the Lodestar.

Barma Battle Group fought in a series of battles, including sending Meteor Squadron on a scouting mission to Chazwa and a fight at Argai Minor, where they took the Treinhaus Citadel, an Imperial installation on the planet. After the heavy fighting at Argai Minor, Barma Battle Group traveled to the Borleias system with a few damaged vessels. The group eventually made its way to Pandem Nai, a planet fortified by the 204th Imperial Fighter Wing.
